directions: Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat) or preheat broiler. Brush zucchini with olive oil. Sprinkle both sides of zucchini with oregano, garlic and rosemary. Season zucchini slices generously with salt and pepper. Grill or broil until zucchini is tender, about 4 minutes per side.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano or 2 teaspoons dried, crumbled
1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary or pinch of dried, crumbled
title: Grilled Zucchini
